idea-plugin.name: Angular CLI QuickSwitch
idea-plugin.description: Angular CLI QuickSwitch allows you to switch amongst files of one component efficiently, by just using one shortcut (default Alt + S). Supported extensions are js, ts, html, php, haml, jade, pug, slim, css, sass, scss, less, styl.
idea-plugin.change-notes:
- Added support for php, haml, jade, pug, slim, less, styl files.
- Updated docs

action.description: Quickly switches between Angular CLI files for one component, e.g. ts, html, css
